items.sentence: You need to take a step back from the daily grind.

Tom got to his feet and walked over to the window.
Tom grabbed his keys and put them into his pocket.
Tom graduated in the top ten percent of his class.
To work here, you need to be able to speak French.

I didn\'t know that Tom had to do that by himself.
Tom turned his life around after a stint in rehab.
